tool_description: Get keyword density analyzing a text. Discover how many times your keyword is occurring on any article, so that you can better optimize your page for SEO or other text analysis.
name: Keyword Density
title: Keyword Density

api_list.name: Keyword Occurences
api_list.description: Submit a text and immediately get a list of relevant words with number of occurences.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-density.p.rapidapi.com/occurence/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-density.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
